meta.name: description
meta.content: Naturalis Biodiversity Center: for anyone who wants to discover more about the richness of nature.

head.title: Naturalis Biodiversity Center | Museum and research in Leiden

a.title: Nature's treasure trove - 200 years of Naturalis

div.p: Naturalis is the national research institute for biodiversity. Our scientists dedicate themselves to describing, understanding and preserving biodiversity without interruption.

div.h3: Visit the European Museum of the Year 2021
div.p: Please, order your necessary tickets before your visit. This can easily be done online, whenever you want. See you soon!Â

a.title: Make a donation for the preservation of biodiversity
Work for the expert in biodiversity
Tips for a great day out

Read more about your visit to Naturalis during the corona crisis
a.span: Visit Naturalis during the corona crisis

div.p: Naturalis is European Museum of the Year 2021! Discover the best of nature at the new Naturalis. Step into the world of dinosaurs and stand face to face withÂ T. rexÂ Trix, or find out what The Netherlands looked like during the last Ice Age.

a.title: An overview of our researchers and specialists
Naturalis offers possibilities for internships and research
Our laboratories make high-tech research possible

div.p: Our knowledge contributes to biodiversity preservation.
Together, we discover the richness of nature. Whatever you know or feel, there's always more to beÂ enthusiastic about, more to learn and more to investigate.

a.title: Follow our stories and keep informed
Welcome your guests at a meeting surrounded by biodiversity

div.p: We are Naturalis Biodiversity Center. Through our impressive collection, knowledge and data, we record all life on Earth. This is important, as our future depends on biodiversity.Â

a.title: Buy your tickets in our Naturalis ticketshop

div.class: form-views-exposed-form__keys js-form-item js-form-type-textfield js-form-item-keys form-item form-item-keys form-type-textfield
div.label: Keywords

a.title: Click to close the search bar

div.p: National collection
Our collection is the foundation for studying and understanding biodiversity worldwide. You will be able to view some of it in the new museum.
National collection

Marvel at the most iconic pieces in our collection online. From quetzals to acorn barnacles, from Apollo butterflies to the T. rex: our collection managers put the spotlight on the most eye-catching objects.
At Naturalis, marvel is the starting point of learning. Together we discover the richness of nature. There is always more to be enthusiastic about, more to learn and more to explore.

img.alt: Onderzoek het leven in de sloot

div.p: With a unique combination of knowledge, talents and skills, we operate as a national museum, academic research institute and heritage institution.

Naturalis employs 120 scientists in seven different research groups. We are happy to offer young scientific talent the opportunity to further develop ideas in a stimulating, open environment. With 80 PhDs and postdocs, Naturalis contributes to innovating Dutch research at the highest level in the green life sciences.
Follow our social media for all the latest news about the museumÂ and our researchers' day-to-day work and new discoveries.
April 8,Â 2021
div.h3: Kevin Beentjes receives PhD on monitoring biodiversity in freshwater
div.p: Kevin Beentjes received his PhD on 8 April for his research on monitoring biodiversity in freshwater at Naturalis Biodiversity Center, where he has been working for ten years now.

a.title: Kevin Beentjes receives PhD on monitoring biodiversity in freshwater

div.p: Volg hier het nieuws over het museum en het dagelijkse werk en nieuwe ontdekkingen van onze onderzoekers.
3 augustus 2021
De 18-jarige MBO-studente Noortje Looijenga beschreef een nieuwe vlindersoort tijdens haar stage bij Naturalis.Â
Follow the news about the museum and the daily work and new discoveries of our researchers here.
An external visitation committee rated our research quality as "excellent"
